弦.definition: bow string; string of musical instrument; watchspring; chord (segment of curve); hypotenuse; CL:根[gen1]

弦切角.definition: chord angle (i.e. angle a chord of a curve makes to the tangent)

弦外之意.definition: see 弦外之音[xian2 wai4 zhi1 yin1]

弦外之響.definition: see 弦外之音[xian2 wai4 zhi1 yin1]

弦月.definition: half-moon; the 7th and 8th and 22nd and 23rd of the lunar month

弦月窗.definition: a narrow slit window; a lunette

弦歌.definition: to sing to a string accompaniment; education (a reference to teaching the people Confucian values by means of song in ancient times)

弦而鼓之.definition: to put strings on the zither, then play it (line from a Ming dynasty text by 劉伯溫|刘伯温[Liu2 Bo2wen1]); (fig.) to play music

弦誦不綴.definition: variant of 弦誦不輟|弦诵不辍[xian2 song4 bu4 chuo4]

弦誦不輟.definition: incessant playing of instruments and reciting of poems (idiom)
